comment: I took Prof. Murray for a 4 week summer course, and it was extremely stressful, but not outside of the expected for a 4 week class. The material was fairly easy and the professor is very communicative. Overall, a very good professor for an online course. Definitely recommend

worst thing is the assignments on Simnet including tests and learning modules with Excel and Access. Start that as soon as possible because its time consuming. Not too hard. We had a mini group assignment that was quick and easy.Assignments in connect also. Also not hard. plus midterm and final exam. Just stay ahead of simnet and you'll be fine.
Hard class lot of papers, discussion, heavy test. Get ready to read whole book.

This class had a good amount of work, but Prof Murray always had specific instructions and was very straight forward, which I like. There are many things that were graded including tests, HW, group project, papers, etc. An easy A as long as you do what you are told.

Prof. Murray was a great professor. Each week you had a chapter quiz (which you could improve your grade if you got things wrong), a simulation exercise, and three tests over the semester that were not cumulative. You do have a couple group projects, but were easy enough and she responded timely. I would take her again, for sure.

Professor Murray is an exceptional choice for an IS professor, she offers multiple extra credit opportunities. HW is all on MyMathLab and they are straight from your notes. All test material can be found from powerpoint presentations. Theres a group project that you work on throughout the semester and it is fairly simple. Great Professor!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: One of the most organized professors I've had which especially matters if you are taking the class online. A good choice of textbook and assignments associated with it are easy. There is a group project but you are graded individually. Re: other assignments--they are not just busy work, you can learn a lot as a professional. Highly recommend!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: Awesome professor! Responds to emails quickly. She reads everything that you write and gives amazing feedback, but yet is not a hard grader. Quizzes are super easy. There is homework, but you can fly though the weeks worth of it within less than an hour. Take her if you can, real GPA booster, plus you'll get something out of it
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects

comment: Dr. Murray is an amazing professor as the course is clear cut and set up with assignments and due dates every week. Very specific instructions however but if you need help she replies almost instantly. The course used Cengage with modules that do get very dull and repetitive but speaking for a choice in a professor, Dr. Murray is great!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Took her over the summer for a 4 week course. The tests were super easy and the assignments were very easy to get done ahead of time as well. Theres a group project but it was pretty easy too. A few papers as well but she grades everything nicely. 100% recommend

This class is super easy. Mary Murray is very responsive and easy to talk to! I am super happy I chose her for this class. Assignments were pretty easy and straightforward as well. The group project was a little tedious but overall she is a very easy grader. Take her!! :)

Professor Murray was awesome. I took her for a 4 week summer session and she made everything so simple and clear. You have homework due every week but you are able to work ahead on assignments and tests/quizzes and they are all super simple. You have one big group project, but if you get a good group and do your part then it's easy.

Took this class online, Dr. Murray is cool. Set time out to get the work done, post on discussions, try not to miss any assignments because it can throw your grade off. Even if you miss an assignment or didn't get a good grade, there are extra credit assignments, but really try your best.

Thank Goodness I took Dr. Murray. The work was extensive and hard. I missed the deadline on a few assignments, but she offers so much extra credit that I was still able to get a good grade. Plan on spending a few hours a week on the work. Read, read, read. Do the online assignments. She's willing to help if you have any questions.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: This class is hard! But she helps by posting videos of the lectures and tries to help you understand with assignments. Study the videos and book on tests! The assignments are easy, but do them ahead of time. She starts everything on Tuesday and its due by Monday. Don't put off the project. Not an easy A! Most of my class got Cs in this course.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Clear grading criteria--Tests are tough

comment: Professor Murray is very helpful and fair in her grading. However, there is a lot of work and plan on spending many hours on homework, project and preparing for tests. I don't recommend taking this course as a 4 week summer class, but I would recommend taking the course with Professor Murray.

Dr. Murray, is a wonderful professor but this class was no walk in the park. As with most online classes there was lots of homework and you had to spend a lot of time working on it. You can tell she loves what she does which makes the class more enjoyable and she's incredible at responding to emails, always willing to help.
